dcterms:description: The Kochia Weed Dataset (KWD) consists of high-resolution RGB images collected from fields infested with Kochia weed, which affects various crops including early and late stage Canola, Oats, Wheat, and Durum. The dataset includes images taken under uncontrolled field conditions, featuring variations in lighting and potential blurriness due to mechanical vibrations.
dcterms:title: Kochia Weed Dataset (KWD)

dcterms:description: The Multi-Stage Canola Dataset (MSCD) contains high-resolution RGB images of Canola crops at different growth stages, specifically early-stage dicots and mid-stage broad leaves. The images were collected from multiple fields under uncontrolled conditions, capturing various lighting scenarios and potential obstructions.
dcterms:title: Multi-Stage Canola Dataset (MSCD)
